content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Maria Mamani from Bolivia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maria Mamani from Bolivia

content: Hello Maria, thanks for coming to see the apartment. Based on the size and location, I was thinking of renting it for 500 Euros per month. However, I am open to negotiating and discussing any potential adjustments to the price. What are your thoughts?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I agree to the price of 450 Euros per month. Thank you for your understanding.
name: Maria Mamani from Bolivia

content: Thank you for your interest in renting the apartment, Maria. I'm glad we were able to come to an agreement on the rental price. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate and I look forward to working with you as a tenant. If you have any questions or concerns, please don't hesitate to let me know.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I have one question. How long do I have to sign the lease agreement?

I want to sign as soon as possible, but I have some doubts about the price. I need to check my budget and make sure I can afford it.
name: Maria Mamani from Bolivia

content: That's completely understandable, Maria. I appreciate your thoughtfulness in wanting to make sure you can afford the rental price. You have until the end of the week to sign the lease agreement, but please let me know as soon as possible if you need any additional time. If you have any other questions or concerns, please don't hesitate to reach out to me. I'm here to help.
name: Heinrich Heine
